tsconfig-nodejs.body:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "module": "commonjs",
    "declaration": true,
    "removeComments": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "target": "es2019",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "baseUrl": "./"
  },
  "exclude": ["node_modules"]
}

tsconfig-browser.body:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "module": "commonjs",
    "declaration": true,
    "removeComments": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
    "experimentalDecorators": true,
    "target": "esnext",
    "sourceMap": true,
    "baseUrl": "./"
  },
  "exclude": ["node_modules"]
}
